title: Dear Riot, can I please buy two skins

embed.description: Rockruu's League of Legends statistics. Discover how Rockruu plays. Learn their best, their worst; all Rockruu's stats history and game records!

body:
I am a world renowned skin collector, I only need two more skins to complete my collection ,because they are unavailable. Could you please let me buy them? Thank you for reading,

Love,
Rockruu
